ari 0.3.0

  • Changelog

Get Codecs for ffmpeg

Source: R/ffmpeg_codecs.R
ffmpeg_codecs.Rd

Get Codecs for ffmpeg

ffmpeg_codecs()

ffmpeg_video_codecs()

ffmpeg_audio_codecs()

ffmpeg_muxers()

ffmpeg_version()

ffmpeg_version_sufficient()

check_ffmpeg_version()

Value

A `data.frame` of codec names and capabilities

Examples

if (ffmpeg_version_sufficient()) {
ffmpeg_codecs()
ffmpeg_video_codecs()
ffmpeg_audio_codecs()
}
